1#ifdef UVW_AS_LIB
2#include "async.h"
3#endif
4
5#include "config.h"
6
7
8namespace uvw {
9
10
11UVW_INLINE void AsyncHandle::sendCallback(uv_async_t *handle) {
12 AsyncHandle &async = *(static_cast<AsyncHandle *>(handle->data));
13 async.publish(AsyncEvent{});
14}
15
16
17UVW_INLINE bool AsyncHandle::init() {
18 return initialize(&uv_async_init, &sendCallback);
19}
20
21
22UVW_INLINE void AsyncHandle::send() {
23 invoke(&uv_async_send, get());
24}
25
26
27}
